text: Sarah Trevis is an English casting director and member of the Casting Directors' Guild and also the Casting Society of America. She is a graduate of the University of Manchester. Her credits include Shallow Grave (1993), Black Beauty (1994), The Ghost and the Darkness with Mary Selway (1996), Flight of the Phoenix (2003) and the series Larkrise to Candleford (2007) for BBC and "Harley and the Davidsons" (2016) for Discovery Channel. Most recently the feature films A United Kingdom (2016), Phantom Thread (2017) and Mary Poppins Returns (2018). She is the youngest sister of Di Trevis, an English theatre director, Derek Trevis, former footballer for Aston Villa and Graham Trevis, recipient of the Queen's Police Medal. Partner to actor Dougray Scott 1992-2006 and has two children born 1998. ==References== Category:British casting directors Category:Living people Category:Film people from the West Midlands (county) Category:Alumni of the University of Manchester Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Birmingham, West Midlands
title: Sarah Trevis
